Habitat codes: H, hardwood forest; P, pine forest; M, mixed forest (canopy at least 50% hardwoods); F, open field; B, building or house including lawns, gardens, drives; W, water (lake, beaver pond, stream); O, other.
Enter two codes: one from the left side of the road, one for the right (for instance, P/F, for pines on the left and a field on the right).
Notes, other observations, suggestions:
